name: business_constraint_verification
description: Verifies the 5 Mandatory Business Rules are enforced

checks.name: Management Company Funding Gate
checks.rule: Company operations cannot begin before SAFE funding is received
checks.description: If companyOpsStartDate precedes safeTranche1Date, system must block/flag

checks.name: Property Activation Gate
checks.rule: Property cannot operate before acquisition and funding
checks.description: operationsStartDate must be >= acquisitionDate and funding must be in place

checks.name: No Negative Cash
checks.rule: Cash balances must never go negative for any entity
checks.description: EndingCash >= 0 for each property, management company, and consolidated portfolio in every period

checks.name: Debt-Free at Exit
checks.rule: All properties must be debt-free at end of projection
checks.description: Outstanding loan balance is repaid from gross sale proceeds before calculating net to equity

checks.name: No Over-Distribution
checks.description: FCF distributions and refinancing proceeds must not exceed available cash
